about_the_game:
This is a trial version of Comic&Picture Shelf software
Is a software used to manage and browse comics and pictures

Support format
Picture format: PNG, JPG, JPEG

Features
Picture wall mode: Each folder has a corresponding cover, you can choose the comics you are interested in by the cover.
Pre-loading function: when browsing pictures, the software will silently load the following pictures.
Drop-down waterfall browsing function: After a page of pictures moves to the bottom, the next picture will be stitched in the back, and will not jump to the next page abruptly.
Auto-play function: set the speed and pause time, enable auto-play to liberate your hands.
Zoom in function: browse the picture interface, hold down the right button and scroll the wheel to zoom in on the arrow position.
Minimize the window: Press the mouse wheel or the Esc key on the keyboard to minimize the window to the taskbar.

Drop-down waterfall browsing function: After a page of pictures moves to the bottom, the next picture will be stitched in the back, and will not jump to the next page abruptly.
Auto-play function: set the speed and pause time, enable auto-play to liberate your hands.
Zoom in function: browse the picture interface, hold down the right button and scroll the wheel to zoom in on the arrow position.
Minimize the window: Press the mouse wheel or the Esc key on the keyboard to minimize the window to the taskbar.
name: Comic&Picture Shelf Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: stand by DirectX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4GHZ
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: This is a software for managing and browsing comics and pictures. Trial version of Comic&Picture Shelf software.
